title: Dragon slayer Vayne chroma pack
body: WTF RITO I CANT USE MY CHROMA PACK

replies.body: YES VAYNE CHROMA PACK STILL BROKEN FOR TEAMBUILDER ONLY THE RED ONE MANAGE TO WORK BUT HER GOLD AND WHITE CHROMA IS NOT ITS BEEN AN ISSUE **FAR** TOO LONG.

Hey SDS K1ng,

Thanks for the report! 

We're aware of issues where sometimes chroma packs aren't loading into the game properly. Unfortunately, we currently don't have a solid repro for the issue and are still investigating. 

I personally use the Nami chroma pack and I've found that selecting -> deselecting -> re-selecting the chroma pack has allowed the chroma pack to be successfully loading. (Crappy workaround, I know. D:)

... going to ask the most obvy, question, do u own the chromas?

If u do, and cant use them
1) restart
2) rage post
3) put in a ticket
